mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PRODUCT (shop_id, name, size, origin, cost, consumer, store, retail, wholesale, partner, agent, contents) VALUES (#{shopId},#{name},#{size},#{origin},#{cost},#{consumer},#{store},#{retail},#{wholesale},#{partner},#{agent},#{contents})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

INSERT INTO PRICE (product_id, user_id, cost, consumer, store, retail, wholeSale, partner, agent, reg_date) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userId},#{cost},#{consumer},#{store},#{retail},#{wholeSale},#{partner},#{agent},NOW())

INSERT INTO SHOP (name, post_num, address, address_detail, tel, profile_image, lon, lat, reg_date, homepage) VALUES (#{name},#{postNum},#{address},#{addressDetail},#{tel},#{profileImage},#{lon},#{lat},NOW(),#{homepage})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, ST_DISTANCE(POINT(#{lon}, #{lat}), POINT(s.lon, s.lat)) AS dist FROM SHOP s, USER u WHERE s.id = u.shop_id AND u.base_role = #{role} ORDER BY dist
